item.title: Setting_up_a_hugo_website_on_github
item.author: etheroz
item.description: Steps Find out which static site generator suits me the best Jekyll - Ruby Hexo - Node.js Hugo - Go Hugo is the fastest, and it has less dependency issues. Install Go To install golang-1.18.1 on Ubuntu 22.04 jammy 1 apt install golang To install newer golang on Ubuntu 22.04 jammy 1 2 3 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:longsleep/golang-backports sudo apt update sudo apt install golang-1.
